short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto New Tab streamlines your browsing experience by automatically opening links in new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- By default opens all links in new tabs.
- Customize behavior by enabling or disabling for specific sites.

This extension provides simple, customizable control over how links behave in your browser.
